verses.verse: Would to God <S%G3785><s%> ye could bear <S%G430><s%> with me <S%G3450><s%> a little <S%G3397><s%> in my folly <S%G877><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> indeed <S%G235><s%> bear <S%G430><s%> with me <S%G3450><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I am jealous <S%G2206><s%> over you <S%G5209><s%> with godly <S%G2316><s%> jealousy <S%G2205><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I have espoused <S%G718><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to one <S%G1520><s%> husband <S%G435><s%>, that I may present <S%G3936><s%> you as a chaste <S%G53><s%> virgin <S%G3933><s%> to Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I fear <S%G5399><s%>, lest <S%G3381><s%> by any means <S%G4458><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> the serpent <S%G3789><s%> beguiled <S%G1818><s%> Eve <S%G2096><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> subtilty <S%G3834><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> minds <S%G3540><s%> should be corrupted <S%G5351><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the simplicity <S%G572><s%> that is in <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3303><s%> he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> preacheth <S%G2784><s%> another <S%G243><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2784><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> preached <S%G2784><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> if ye receive <S%G2983><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> received <S%G2983><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> accepted <S%G1209><s%>, ye might <S%G430><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> bear with <S%G430><s%> him.
For <S%G1063><s%> I suppose <S%G3049><s%> I was <S%G5302><s%> not a whit <S%G3367><s%> behind <S%G5302><s%> the very <S%G5228><s%> chiefest <S%G3029><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> I be rude <S%G2399><s%> in speech <S%G3056><s%>, yet <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in knowledge <S%G1108><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> we have been throughly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> made manifest <S%G5319><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

<S%G2228><s%>Have I committed <S%G4160><s%> an offence <S%G266><s%> in abasing <S%G5013><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> might be exalted <S%G5312><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> I have preached <S%G2097><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> freely <S%G1432><s%>?
I robbed <S%G4813><s%> other <S%G243><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%>, taking <S%G2983><s%> wages <S%G3800><s%> of them, to <S%G4314><s%> do <S%G1248><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> service <S%G1248><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when I was present <S%G3918><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wanted <S%G5302><s%>, I was <S%G3756><s%> chargeable <S%G2655><s%> to no man <S%G3762><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> that which was lacking <S%G5303><s%> to me <S%G3450><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> which came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> supplied <S%G4322><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things I have kept <S%G5083><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> from being burdensome <S%G4><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> so will I keep <S%G5083><s%> myself.

As the truth <S%G225><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, no man <S%G3756><s%> shall stop <S%G4972><s%> <S%G5420><s%> me <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1691><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> boasting <S%G2746><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Achaia <S%G882><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G1302><s%>? because <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>? God <S%G2316><s%> knoweth <S%G1492><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%>, that <S%G2532><s%> I will do <S%G4160><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may cut off <S%G1581><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> from them which desire <S%G2309><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they glory <S%G2744><s%>, they may be found <S%G2147><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> we <S%G2249><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> are false apostles <S%G5570><s%>, deceitful <S%G1386><s%> workers <S%G2040><s%>, transforming themselves <S%G3345><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> marvel <S%G2298><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> is transformed <S%G3345><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of light <S%G5457><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> it is no <S%G3756><s%> great thing <S%G3173><s%> if <S%G1499><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ministers <S%G1249><s%> also <S%G1499><s%> be transformed <S%G3345><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the ministers <S%G1249><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>; whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

I say <S%G3004><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, Let <S%G1380><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> me <S%G1511><s%> <S%G3165><s%> a fool <S%G878><s%>; if otherwise <S%G1490><s%>, yet <S%G2579><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a fool <S%G878><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> may boast myself <S%G2744><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> little <S%G3397><s%>.

That which <S%G3739><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%>, I speak <S%G2980><s%> it not <S%G3756><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it were foolishly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G877><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> confidence <S%G5287><s%> of boasting <S%G2746><s%>.
Seeing that <S%G1893><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, I will glory <S%G2744><s%> also <S%G2504><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> ye suffer <S%G430><s%> fools <S%G878><s%> gladly <S%G2234><s%>, seeing ye yourselves are <S%G5607><s%> wise <S%G5429><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye suffer <S%G430><s%>, if a man <S%G1536><s%> bring <S%G2615><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into bondage <S%G2615><s%>, if a man <S%G1536><s%> devour <S%G2719><s%> you, if a man <S%G1536><s%> take <S%G2983><s%> of you, if a man <S%G1536><s%> exalt himself <S%G1869><s%>, if a man <S%G1536><s%> smite <S%G1194><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%>.

I speak <S%G3004><s%> as concerning <S%G2596><s%> reproach <S%G819><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> though <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> had been weak <S%G770><s%>. Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> whereinsoever <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> is bold <S%G5111><s%>, (I speak <S%G3004><s%> foolishly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G877><s%>,) I am bold <S%G5111><s%> also <S%G2504><s%>.

Are they <S%G1526><s%> Hebrews <S%G1445><s%>? so am I <S%G2504><s%>. Are they <S%G1526><s%> Israelites <S%G2475><s%>? so am I <S%G2504><s%>. Are they <S%G1526><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>? so am I <S%G2504><s%>.

Are they <S%G1526><s%> ministers <S%G1249><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>? (I speak <S%G2980><s%> as a fool <S%G3912><s%>) I <S%G1473><s%> am more <S%G5228><s%>; in <S%G1722><s%> labours <S%G2873><s%> more abundant <S%G4056><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> stripes <S%G4127><s%> above measure <S%G5234><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> prisons <S%G5438><s%> more frequent <S%G4056><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> deaths <S%G2288><s%> oft <S%G4178><s%>.
Of <S%G5259><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> five times <S%G3999><s%> received I <S%G2983><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> stripes save <S%G3844><s%> one <S%G3391><s%>.

Thrice <S%G5151><s%> was I beaten with rods <S%G4463><s%>, once <S%G530><s%> was I stoned <S%G3034><s%>, thrice <S%G5151><s%> I suffered shipwreck <S%G3489><s%>, a night and a day <S%G3574><s%> I have been <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the deep <S%G1037><s%>;

In journeyings <S%G3597><s%> often <S%G4178><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> of waters <S%G4215><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> of robbers <S%G3027><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> mine own countrymen <S%G1085><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the heathen <S%G1484><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2047><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, in perils <S%G2794><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> false brethren <S%G5569><s%>;

In <S%G1722><s%> weariness <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> painfulness <S%G3449><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> watchings <S%G70><s%> often <S%G4178><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> hunger <S%G3042><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thirst <S%G1373><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> fastings <S%G3521><s%> often <S%G4178><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> cold <S%G5592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nakedness <S%G1132><s%>.

Beside <S%G5565><s%> those things that are without <S%G3924><s%>, that which <S%G3588><s%> cometh upon <S%G1999><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> daily <S%G2250><s%> <S%G2596><s%>, the care <S%G3308><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%>.

Who <S%G5101><s%> is weak <S%G770><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I am <S%G770><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> weak <S%G770><s%>? who <S%G5101><s%> is offended <S%G4624><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> burn <S%G4448><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>?
If <S%G1487><s%> I must needs <S%G1163><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%>, I will glory <S%G2744><s%> of the things which concern <S%G3588><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>.

The God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> blessed <S%G2128><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> evermore <S%G165><s%>, knoweth <S%G1492><s%> that I <S%G3754><s%> lie <S%G5574><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> the governor <S%G1481><s%> under Aretas <S%G702><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> kept <S%G5432><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of the Damascenes <S%G1153><s%> with a garrison <S%G5432><s%>, desirous <S%G2309><s%> to apprehend <S%G4084><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> a window <S%G2376><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a basket <S%G4553><s%> was I let down <S%G5465><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the wall <S%G5038><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> escaped <S%G1628><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>.
